name: Ticket Utils, Inc.
overview:
TicketUtils is a suite of software solutions for the ticket industry designed to drive innovation, increase productivity and reduce costs. The suite consists of:

Interactive Seating Charts; this product provides ticket brokers, ticket exchanges and any ecommerce site selling tickets with clickable seating charts that show available tickets by section.

The technology is powered by a lightweight JavaScript engine, making the seating charts fully compatible with iPhone and iPad devices as well as Android and all other browsers.

The TicketUtils’ seating charts catalog currently features static and interactive support for 2,500+ U.S. and International venues and over 5,000+ custom static seating chart configurations. It is the largest and most diverse licensable seating chart catalog in the industry.

RocketPoster, a multi-channel ecommerce solution for ticket brokers that simplifies the selling and distribution of tickets on eBay.com (United States), eBay.ca (Canada) and eBay.uk (United Kingdom). RocketPoster currently powers over 80% of all “Ticket” listings currently on eBay.com and is widely accepted as the Gold Standard of eBay listing tools for ticket brokers.

RocketPoster powers the needs of hundreds of ticket brokers with combined inventory in excess of $250 million (USD), and is projected to facilitate the sale of over $100 million (USD) of tickets in 2012.

AutoSync, an industrial strength application that will instantly synchronize your Point of Sale (POS) inventory files to each exchange without any manual intervention. AutoSync is now in its 4th generation (v4.0) and supports many advanced features including: Price Markups & Markdowns, Exclude Filters and support for more than 20 Predefined Exchanges.

Social Store, new social media integration for broadcasting and selling ticket inventory on Facebook

TicketUtils helps drive innovation for the ticketing industry and is among the fastest growing technology companies within this space.
